oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Drug Piracy I: Legitimate Pharmacy Compounding, Pioneer and Generic Drugs and Registered Products, and Medical Devices? What are the Facts and how can this Affect My Practice?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bertone, Joseph J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: pioneer drugs
drug usage
generic drugs
registered products
medical devices
pharmacy-compounded products
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Veterinarians are often unclear on the differentiation and the clinical ramifications of the use of pioneer and generic drugs and registered products, medical devices, and pharmacy-compounded products. In addition, what are the laws that revolve around these issues?
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2004; 49-52
